file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        '200':
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Success"
      parameters:
      - "$ref": "#/components/parameters/limitParam"
components:
  parameters:
    limitParam:
      name: limit
      in: query
      description: max records to return
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
